items.name: Amritsari Nutri Kulcha
items.description: Street style soya chunk curry cooked in a base of spicy and tangy onion, tomato, fresh spices and soya granules. Served with 2 kulchas + pickled onion + achar

items.name: Andhra Chilli Chicken Curry
items.description: Spicy chicken curry made with freshly blend spice paste made of caramalised onion, garlic, coriander and curry leaves cooked in a thick gravy and topped with creamy coconut milk.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Veg Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Shallow fried spiced mashed potato wrapped in whole wheat flatbread with onions and frankie masala. Served with green chutney.

items.name: One Pot Chicken Rice
items.description: Chicken marinated with ginger & garlic paste and spices pan roasted in ghee and cooked together with onion, rice, coconut milk and flavourful spices

items.name: Blackeyed Peas Curry
items.description: Blackeyed peas cooked in a base of onion, tomato, ginger garlic paste and fresh ground spices topped with lots of fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Elaichi Ghost
items.description: Tender pieces of lamb cooked in a mild, aromatic currry with onions, tomato and freshly ground garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bombay Cheese Chilli Toast
items.description: Mumbai's famous street style grilled sandwich with spicy stuffing and loads of cheese. Perfect for an evening snack.

items.name: Mix Vegetable Cheela
items.description: Shredded carrot, cabbage, onions, tomato, chillies, ginger and spices mixed with chickpea flour and cooked on a pan. Served with a side of tangy tomato & onion chutney. (3 cheela)

items.name: Hyderabadi Nizami Handi
items.description: Mix veggies cooked in a base of buttery creamy thick gravy made of onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and cashew nut with fresh garam masala and topped with fresh cream and coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Prawns Pathia
items.description: A delicious & humble Parsi dish. Prawns marinated with salt, turmeric, lime and cooked with onions and fresh blend spice mix of dry chilles, garlic, vinegar and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with dal + rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sev Puri
items.description: Popular street food of Mumbai. Crispy fried flour dish topped with mashed potato, onions, spicy green chutney, tangy sweet tamrind chutney, sev, fresh coriander and pomogranate seeds. (6 puris)

items.name: Ragi Besan Cheela
items.description: Batter made of ragi and chickpea flour spiced with cumin, coriander & ginger and cooked on a pan like a crepe. Served with chutney. (3 cheela)

items.name: Kadhai Paneer
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in flavourful gravy with onion, tomato puree, fresh fragrant spices topped with petals of onion, capsicum and fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Green Egg Curry
items.description: Hard boiled eggs  in creamy velvety gravy made with a blend of onion, garlic, coriander, spices, curry leaves and coconut milk for a mild and aromatic flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Hara Bhara Kebab
items.description: Patty made with spinach, boiled potatoes, green peas and spices; shallow fried for a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney. (4 kebabs)

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chilli pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for the flavourful taste. Served with papad. A complete comfort meal.

items.name: Paneer Matar Pulao
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in flavourful spices with chillies, ginger, garlic, caramalised onions and green peas cooked together with fragrant basmati rice and ghee. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken 65 Biryani
items.description: Boneless chicken marinated with spices, lime juice and ginger garlic paste and deep fried. Cooked together with fragrant basmati rice and topped with mint, coriander and fried onions. Served with yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Aloo Tikki Cholle Chaat
items.description: Mashed potatoes mixed with spices, onion, coriander, chillies and shallow fried for a crispy outer layer smeared with spicy chickpea curry, tangy sweet chutney, green chutney, sev and fresh coriander.

items.name: Puttu & Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry

items.name: Mushroom Biryani
items.description: Mushrooms cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, galic, whole spices and freshly ground spices cooked with fragrant basmati rice topped with caramalised onions and fresh coriander. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Kolambi Bhat
items.description: Flavourful prawns cooked with ginger, garlic, onion and other spices combined with aromatic basmati rice and fresh coriander served wih yogurt dip + papad + achar

items.name: Oats and Rava Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made of oats and semolina (granulated wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion, cashew and chilles. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Chicken Kheema Paratha
items.description: Minced chicken cooked with different spices and stuffed in whole wheat dough, flattened and cooked on a pan. Served with spicy onion tomato dip. (2 paratha)

items.name: Veg Jalfrezi
items.description: Mix veggies cooked with onion, tomato puree, ginger, garlic and stir fried on high heat and sprinkled with fresh garam masala and cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pahadi Chicken
items.description: Chicken curry cooked with ginger, fennel, garlic, onions, yogurt  with fresh roasted masala
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Oats & Rava Unniappam
items.description: Oats flour mixed with semolina, onions, grated carrot, ginger, yogurt and tempered with spices and cooked in small round moulds. Served with coconut chutney. (7 unniappams)

items.name: Anda Paratha
items.description: Whole wheat Indian bread stuffed with grated boiled egg mixed with spices. Served with spicy onion tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Paneer wale Rajma Chawal
items.description: Soft Indian cottage cheese shallow fried in ghee and cooked with red kidney beans in a spicy flavourful gravy with fresh garam masala
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Salmon Tikka Masala
items.description: Salmon fillet grilled on pan and cooked with creamy thick buttery sauce and topped with fresh coriander and garam masala
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bread Pakoda
items.description: Mashed potato mixed with spices & chillies stuffed between bread slices dipped in chickpea batter and fried for the crispy layer. Served with spicy green chutney. (2 pakodas)

items.name: Missal Pav
items.description: A popular street food of Mumbai. Mixed sprouts boiled and cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chilles and spicy masala. Topped with some fresh coriander. Served with 2 buns, farsan, and onions

items.name: Pinde Cholle
items.description: A recipe from the northen part of India. Black chickpeas cooked with ginger garlic and caramalised onions with fresh spices and topped with some fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 batura + pickled onions

items.name: Butter Chicken
items.description: Creamy, buttery and flavour packed gravy with smoked grilled chicken. Topped with fresh cream and coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Ragada Pattice
items.description: Mashed potato patty fried for a crispy skin and served with green pea churry smeared with tangy, sweet and spicy chutney

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Onam Sadiya
items.description: Celebrate the auspicious day of Onam by indulging in the rich flavours from Kerala with a mouth watering feast. Rice served with Sambar + Moru Kootan + Cabbage Thoran + Beans Thoran + Avial + Olan + Erissery + Cucumber pachadi + Inji Puli + Banana Chips + Parippu Pradhaman + Papad.

items.name: Navratna Pulao
items.description: Assorted vegetables, cashew & rasins cooked together with fragrant basmati rice and spices. Served with yogurt raita + papad + achar

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked together with chillies, garlic, ginger and freshly ground spies, slow cooked on low flame to perfection.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Egg Kathi Roll
items.description: A popular street food of Kolkata. Flattened Indian bread cooked on a pan with eggs and wrapped in to a roll with pickled onion, cucumber and fresh masala. Served with spicy green chutney

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Assorted veggies and chicken stir fried and cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Ragi & Besan ka Cheela
items.description: Gluten free snack with ragi and chickpea flour mixed togther with onion, ginger, chillies and spices and cooked on a pan like a crepe. Served with some tangy tomato and onion chutney

items.name: Palak Garlic Kichidi
items.description: Spinach, lentils and rice cooked together with garlic, onion, tomato, ginger and chillies in a pressure cooker and tempered with dry red chillies, cumin and garlic flakes. A complete comfort meal served with achar and papad
